message.body: Hi I'm doing well, how about you?
Busy! I'm taking a summer school course and have a mid term. I'm trying to wrap up my work before. Are you getting hit by the heat wave?
Me too! lol I have a micro bio midterm this afternoon. The heat is horrible in Michigan. Not really heat its about 90 which we've gotten used to but its
very humid so it makes it about ten times worse.
Yeah, in Boston its 90+ and a billion degrees humidity
Same. Hardest this is I'm Muslim and its Ramadan. Between walking to class work and library on campus, I spend most of the afternoon in the sun. Fasting
Oh man, I can even imagine. That's devotion. I bet the first sip after sundown is insanely satisfying
Lol yeah but for me its not really the thirst lol I barely drank water when I wasn't fasting. That's something you get used to, or at least I do, coming
from Sudan. Its just needing all the protein and carbs to get you through the day.
Yeah, I don't know if I have the strength to pull it off
